description: A shortening of dynamo-electric machine. The element dynamo- is ultimately from Ancient Greek δύναμις (dúnamis, “power”).

entries.meaning: (physics) An electricity generator; a dynamo-electric machine.
(astrophysics) The mechanism by which a celestial body, such as the Earth or a star, generates a magnetic field.

examples: That new Vice President of Marketing is a real dynamo; sales have already gone up this quarter.
